definition: Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Angleton briefed me on the contents of the finished report.
sentences.chinese: 安格爾頓向我簡單介紹了調查報告的內容。

sentences.english: A painting of Ingres was suspended on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一幅安格爾的繪畫掛在牆上。

sentences.english: Ingres had made a fatal mistake.
sentences.chinese: 安格爾曾經犯了一個致命的錯誤。

sentences.english: I learnt in the Menai Straits off Anglesey at 19. It's an escape from thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我19歲的時候在梅奈海峽的安格爾西島學會帆板。
